title: Design-Based Research Program for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogical theory and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program for teacher professional development in post-COVID online education environments, with participants consisting of pre-service teachers or education majors

learning_goals: Participants develop at least one lesson module by applying online instructional design principles (aligning objectives-activities-assessments)
Participants identify at least three core elements for customized online professional development programs through teacher needs analysis
Participants experiment with and evaluate effective integration strategies for educational technology tools using design-based research (DBR) methodology
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
